overview: Nearly fifty years after the events of "Black Christmas," Sam, Jess Bradford's granddaughter, is spending Christmas Eve at her grandmother's old country mansion with two girlfriends. Stalked by a sinister evil that has been lurking in the shadows for years, Sam is about to come face to face with the man who terrorized her grandmother's sorority in 1974.
tagline: You always knew he'd call back.
title: It's Me, Billy
